name: Aqua Kitty - Milk Mine Defender
descr:
[b]Aqua Kitty[/b] is a fast paced retro styled submarine arcade shooter with optional 2 player local Co-op.
Blast through hordes of mechanical sea monsters in your kitty sub and defend the deep sea milk mining kittens!
[b]THE MILK MUST FLOW![/b]

[img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/263880/extras/ak_mechanic.png?t=1622379330[/img][h2]Story[/h2]Due to a sudden shortage of milk, cats around the world are forced to seek out new sources to get their fix.
You and your team of milk mining kittens have overcome a fear of water to drill down under the ocean seabed and begin extracting vast reserves of what seems to be naturally forming full-fat milk.
Get ready for fast paced submarine action, defending the kittens from disruptive mechanical sea creatures.[h2]Key Features[/h2]
[img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/263880/extras/ak_bulletpoint.png?t=1622379330[/img][b]Optional 2 player local CO-OP[/b].
[img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/263880/extras/ak_bulletpoint.png?t=1622379330[/img][b]Branching map[/b] progression of levels.
[img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/263880/extras/ak_bulletpoint.png?t=1622379330[/img][b]3 Main Game Campaign Modes[/b]
[img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/263880/extras/ak_bulletpoint2.png?t=1622379330[/img][b]Normal Mode[/b] - the standard game of branching levels full of mechanical enemies with differing behaviours.
[img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/263880/extras/ak_bulletpoint2.png?t=1622379330[/img][b]Easy Mode[/b] - a version of Normal mode in case you found it too hard, with more health and easier enemies.
[img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/263880/extras/ak_bulletpoint2.png?t=1622379330[/img][b]Arcade Mode[/b] - a special survival mode where you must collect gems to purchase powerups.
[img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/263880/extras/ak_bulletpoint.png?t=1622379330[/img][b]Depth based power-up systems[/b] which gives partial control on the type and location of the power-ups created (allowing tactical advantage).
[img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/263880/extras/ak_bulletpoint.png?t=1622379330[/img][b]Classic infinite mode[/b] milk-free level, that never ever ends - for the hardcore challenge.
[img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/263880/extras/ak_bulletpoint.png?t=1622379330[/img][b]Dual firing submarine[/b] with a rechargeable secondary weapon that needs to be managed carefully (upgrades through game progress in Easy and Normal Modes, but upgrades via a shop system in Arcade Mode).
[img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/263880/extras/ak_bulletpoint.png?t=1622379330[/img][b]Varying sea depths[/b] per level which subtly affect gameplay.
[img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/263880/extras/ak_bulletpoint.png?t=1622379330[/img][b]Chain kill combo system[/b] allowing the more skilled player to maximise score.
[img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/263880/extras/ak_bulletpoint.png?t=1622379330[/img][b]Steam online leaderboards[/b] to challenge and achievements to obtain.
[img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/263880/extras/ak_bulletpoint.png?t=1622379330[/img][b]Hand drawn[/b] pixel art graphics, displayed at a crisp 720p.
[img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/263880/extras/ak_bulletpoint.png?t=1622379330[/img][b]Awesome[/b] chiptune music taking inspiration from the best of the C64 and Amiga days.[h2]Development history[/h2]Hello, here is a short history of this indie games' development which we hope will be of interest.
Aqua Kitty was made by a core team of two people with audio created by Electric Cafe and the game box art by artist David Hankin.
It began as a small modern-retro styled PC game, designed to run at a crisp 1280x720 it was created with a love of the 16bit gaming era and late 80s video arcade games.

There were originally 3 core versions of the game available of different hardware - PC, XBox360 and Sony PSM.
[img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/263880/extras/ak_vita.png?t=1622379330[/img]
Sony version is the oldest and smallest version. A critically acclaimed launch title for PSM (Vita).
[img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/263880/extras/ak_360.png?t=1622379330[/img]
XBox version is the Sony version with extra added levels + enemies + refinements.
[img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/263880/extras/ak_pc.png?t=1622379330[/img]
PC version is the most feature rich and improves on the XBox one with new Weapons + Gradius style Arcade mode + yet further refinements and extra details (with the Steam version being unique in having online leaderboards and achievements).

All the new things we have added to the Steam version will also be rolled back into the other PC versions unless Steam specific (ie Online leaderboards, achievements, trading cards are STEAM ONLY).
detail:
名称: Aqua Kitty - Milk Mine Defender
类型: 动作, 独立
开发商: TIKIPOD, Electric Cafe
发行商: TIKIPOD
系列: AQUA KITTY
发行日期: 2014 年 2 月 3 日
review: 全部评测: 特别好评 (285) - 此游戏的 285 篇用户评测中有 87% 为好评。
全部评测: 特别好评 (285 篇中的 87%) 发布至今
sysreq:
Windows
最低配置:
操作系统 *: Windows XP / Vista / 7 / 8
处理器: 1.2Ghz Processor
内存: 1 GB RAM
显卡: DirectX 9.0c-compatible graphics card with 128 MB VRAM
DirectX 版本: 9.0c
存储空间: 需要 140 MB 可用空间
声卡: DirectX 9.0c
附注事项: Controls: Joypads or Keyboard. Xbox 360 controller recommended.
*
2024 年 1 月 1 日（PT）起，Steam 客户端将仅支持 Windows 10 及更新版本。
